Situation overview

Altanine – a patient-centric treatment

Altanine increases efficiency and improves patient experience in Metformin treatment

  • Patient-friendly treatment
  • Special patented enteric coating for targeted release
  • Enhanced bioavailability of the medication
  • Improved body absorption
  • Reduced gastrointestinal side effects
  • Lowers the necessary dosage of Metformin
Learn More Learn More Learn More

Phase One, Target Markets

We are strategically positioned within the pharmaceutical industry by targeting well-established and rapidly expanding markets

Set to rapidly gain market share by surpassing current options in effectiveness and ease of use, our initial focus is diabetes, weight control, sexual health, and neurocare markets.
